DOC.detailed_description: METHODS The present study single-blind randomized trial , conduct accord Declaration Helsinki , guideline Good Clinical Practice , ( CONSORT ) Statement guideline . The study protocol approve Institutional Review Board Ethics Committee ( project number : 24/2013 ) . One hundred fifty consecutive outpatient relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis gait and/or balance disturbance , attend Laboratory Robotic Neurorehabilitation IRCCS Neurolesi Bonino-Pulejo ( Messina , Italy ) January 2015 January 2016 , invite participate study , screen study eligibility . Inclusion/exclusion criterion Inclusion criterion : age 30-65 year ; severe walk disability Expanded Disability Status Score 3.5 6.0 ( Piramidal subitem ≥3 ) ; Montreal Cognitive Assessment score ≥24 ; absence concomitant neurological orthopedic condition may interfere ambulation ; stable pharmacological therapy least 6 month . Exclusion criterion : multiple sclerosis relapse three month prior recruitment ; presence paroxysmal vertigo ; low limb botulinum toxin injection within previous 12 week ; cardiorespiratory instability ; high-risk spontaneous fracture ; lower-limb skin lesion phlebitis/thrombosis ; 130 kg body weight .
